snippet: The two new dances, both created in 2011, will have their New York premiere as part of Ms. Brown's upcoming season at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, which runs from Jan. 30 to Feb. 2.
abstract: The two new dances, both created in 2011, will have their New York premiere as part of Ms. Brown's upcoming season at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, which runs from Jan. 30 to Feb. 2.

headline.main: Trisha Brown to Retire From Making New Work
